headline: Deltix Trading Platform Integrates with Architect Financial Technology's AX Perpetual Futures Exchange
summary: Architect Financial Technologies Inc. ("Architect" or "The Company") announced today that DeltixLab's ("Deltix") trading platform has integrated with the Company's perpetual futures exchange AX. The partnership will enable Deltix clients to trade perpetual futures on traditional underlying asset classes within its advanced institutional trading platform alongside traditional futures and digital assets.
